title: Flora Hospitality opens Al Barsha property
text:
By Sarah Williams Sunday, 12 July 2015 4:16 PM 
Flora Hospitality, a group operating hotels in Dubai and India, has opened Flora Al Barsha Hotel near the Mall of the Emirates. 
The Al Barsha hotel is the newest addition to Flora’s Dubai portfolio, which comprises eight hotels and hotel apartments. 
The new four-star property, located on Sheikh Zayed Road has 186 rooms. 
V.A. Hussein, chairman & CEO of Flora Hospitality, said of the opening: "We are delighted to announce the opening of our latest Flora Hospitality four-star Hotel as part of our extensive expansion plan across the UAE, and we look forward to welcoming our valued guests who have been anticipating the unveiling of the new Flora Al Barsha Hotel”. 
"We have selected an extraordinarily talented team and the new property is set to deliver outstanding personalised service for both our leisure and business guests." 
The hotel will cater to both business and leisure travellers and features complimentary high-speed wifi, with room options spanning from Classic to Deluxe and Premiere. 
The suite options include the Executive Suites and Two Bedroom Deluxe Suites, featuring 75 to 115 square metres of space and configured for the highest comfort. 
Food and beverage offerings include an all-day dining option offering continental, seafood, Mediterranean, Arabic and Pan-Asian cuisine. 
The hotel's 24-hour Coffee Shop offers a wide range of premium coffees, light meals and A La Carte menu. 
The hotel also features a TechnoGym fitness centre, swimming pool, Spa and wellness centre including jacuzzi, sauna and spa services.
